text: mema govipala satunge kusa tula æti dæ piriminta pamanak satuya. apage sahakariyanhata tahanam karana laddaki. eya miya giya tattvaye tibe nam ehi ovuhu havulkaruvan veti yæyi ovuhu pavasati. ovunge mema prakasayata ohu (allah) ovunata prativipaka denu æta. niyata vasayenma ohu pragnavantaya. sarva gnaniya
